name: Parallel Thinking
description: Simultaneous exploration of multiple perspectives and approaches in parallel

steps.name: Identify Parallel Tracks - Define multiple approaches
steps.description: Identify multiple independent approaches or perspectives to explore simultaneously

steps.name: Explore Multiple Tracks - Simultaneous analysis
steps.description:
Explore different approaches simultaneously without forcing convergence

Explore multiple tracks simultaneously: Track 1 (analytical), Track 2 (creative), Track 3 (practical), Track 4 (user-focused). Don't try to reconcile yet - let each track develop independently. What does each perspective reveal?

steps.name: Cross-Pollinate Insights - Find connections
steps.description:
Look for unexpected connections and insights between the parallel tracks

Look for connections between parallel tracks: How do insights from one track inform another? What unexpected combinations emerge? Where do tracks complement or contradict each other? What new insights arise from the intersections?

steps.name: Maintain Multiple Options - Preserve diversity
steps.description: Keep multiple viable options open rather than forcing premature convergence

steps.name: Synthesize When Ready - Integrate insights
steps.description: Synthesize the parallel tracks when natural integration points emerge
